column2: "Hello there! Do I seem in a good mood? Can you tell?"
"I got into ARKS Office staff by special selection!"
"It looks like people without ability can get hired under special circumstances."
"Some higher up person recognized how hard I was working and hired me directly!"
"It's been a complete shock to me, somehow telling you, it seems to be finally sinking in."
"I did it! I finally did it!"
"Now it seems like I can finally keep my chest up when I talk to him."
"Thanks you so much for all of the advice you've given me! It helped a lot."
"Let's both work hard together as ARKS now! Later!"
